title: My portfolio V2
description: I completely remade my portfolio, which was initially built with Next.js. It now runs on Angular and Nest.js. My Lighthouse scores have improved significantly, and the load time is much lower. I also bought a Domain for the occasion.

title: Sudoku app
description: A sudoku app made with Angular and Nest.js for the backend. It uses google O-auth2 Api to login and game data is stored in an SQL databas.

title: Ai-Chat-bot
description: Its a chat bot made with huggingface Api and Mistral LLM. Making this project really improved my skills with Ai integration. I used chatscope library to display the chat.

title: Youtube downloader
description: It is a small tool to download the MP4 from a YouTube link. Since I used yt-dlp, it is necessary to download the CLI on your local machine to make it work. I would have loved to deploy it on a host, but YouTube blocks all requests that come from host services by default.

title: My portfolio
description: It is an app made with Next.js and Material-UI. I enjoyed playing with the features Material provides, and I feel more comfortable with it than during the YouTube downloader development.

title: Piano Training App
description: My longest work. As a piano student, I really needed a tool to train my muscle memory and extend my musical vocabulary. It is a pretty complete app that contains a synthesizer, a MIDI interface, and a lot of parameters.
